ORIENTATION_BY_SENSOR - Static variable in class net.gliblybits.bitsengine.core.BitsApp
App will change it's orientation by the internal sensors.
ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE - Static variable in class net.gliblybits.bitsengine.core.BitsApp

App will start in portrait mode and change it's orientation by the internal sensors.
